post.title: cant connect to virgin mobile
post.content: bought a broadband 2 go usb device at best buy pluged it to my lattop but every time i try to connect to virgin mobile i get error must use cookies ....but my computer is set to accept all cookies .i tried shutting all my security features off but still cant connect. i then tried uninstalling program and drivers and reinstalling them with no luck. tried calling virgin mobile up but they dont answer phone . any help would be appreciated.
